title: Robinson campaigning transgender restroom usage seek GOP nomination
summary: Lt  Gov  Mark Robinson  currently the front runner in North Carolina s Republican gubernatorial primary  is campaigning on the issue of transgender people and restroom  Political expert say the issue probably won t help him in November
source_text: campaigning on transgender restroom usage a he seek GOP nominationLt  Gov  Mark Robinson  currently the front runner in North Carolina s Republican gubernatorial primary  is campaigning on the issue of transgender people and restroom  Political expert say the issue probably won t help him in November Posted 2024 02 12T23 03 58 00 00   Updated 2024 02 13T00 26 45 00 00NC candidate  expert respond to Lt  Gov  Mark Robinson comment House Bill 2By Laura Leslie   WRAL capitol bureau chiefWith the primary election just three week away  Republican gubernatorial front runner Lt  Gov  Mark Robinson is campaigning on the issue of transgender people and restroom  If you re a man on Friday night   Robinson told a crowd of supporter at a recent event in Cary   and all the sudden on Saturday you feel like a woman  and you want to go in the woman s bathroom in the mall  you will be arrested   or whatever we got to do to you  We got to protect our woman  That s an echo of a 2016 bill that regulated which restroom transgender people could use  The bill  known a HB2  provoked a tremendous international backlash  including a boycott that cost the state billion of dollar in lost investment  job and event  before the law wa partially repealed the next year N C  State political scientist Steven Greene doesn t think state lawmaker are likely to want to revisit that issue in an election year  It s bad politics   Greene told WRAL News   Arguably  this could help him win the Republican primary  but he already seems in a strong position there  And looking at the general election  running a a right wing culture warrior is not a recipe for winning statewide election a governor in North Carolina  Robinson s campaign didn t respond to a request for comment  Republican legislative leader also didn t respond to inquiry about revisiting HB2 Meredith College political scientist David McLennan say it s the latest example in Robinson s long track record of anti LGBTQ statement  He said it s probably good for Robinson s fundraising  but may not sit well with voter in November if Robinson win his party s nomination in the primary  When he talk about dehumanizing people and making them unable to use bathroom  that may be too far for the average voter who might even be center right on this particular issue   McLennan said  He s provocative  and that get him a lot of airtime   McLennan added   But on the other hand  he s going to be somewhat like Donald Trump   he s probably the greatest turnout machine that the Democrats can hope for  Robinson s Republican primary opponent criticized Robinson s comment  Mark Robinson is history s latest example of someone rising to power through hate   said State Treasurer Dale Folwell  who is also seeking the Republican gubernatorial nomination Bill Graham  a Salisbury lawyer is also seeking the nomination   Mark

title: Principal drag queen side gig resigns pressure Oklahoma top school official
summary: State Superintendent Ryan Walters demanded Shane Murnan be fired because he performed a a drag queen on night and weekend at club in Oklahoma City
source_text: drag queen side gig resigns under pressure from Oklahoma school officialState Superintendent Ryan Walters is calling for a regulation that would allow educator to be fired for  act that excessively promote sexuality  outside of work Shane Murnan  principal at John Glenn Elementary School in Oklahoma  say he wa forced out of his job because of his side gig a a drag performer Courtesy Shane MurnanPrintFeb  13  2024  2 29 AM UTCBy Tyler KingkadeFor two decade  Shane Murnan worked a an educator by day and a drag queen on night and weekend at club in Oklahoma City  He won award for his performance a he moved up in his career to become an administrator  He never had a problem with his dual identity  he said  until last year At the start of the fall 2023 semester  a Murnan started a new job a principal of John Glenn Elementary School in the Western Heights School District  an anonymous newsletter posted about his drag persona and past criminal charge he had faced  Two day later  on Aug  31  the far right social medium account Libs of TikTok posted about Murnan  and Ryan Walters  the incendiary state superintendent  called for him to be fired  Soon after  the district and Murnan received bomb threat  according to police record and interview Now Murnan is leaving his job  while Walters try to enact rule to make it easier to fire educator who perform in drag outside of their job  Murnan said he most likely won t work for another school district in Oklahoma after this experience  I m a very professional person   I ve worked really hard   Murnan said in an interview   I ve gone to school  I got my bachelor s  my master s  my doctorate   I have been devoted to education  trying to make it a better thing  But they ve destroyed me  and I don t know where I m going or what I m doing now  This ha been a nightmare  The Western Heights School Board voted Monday to accept Murnan s resignation at it regular monthly meeting  Murnan said district administrator had not allowed him to work in the John Glenn Elementary School building during the school day since September because they said it wa a safety risk  While Western Heights Superintendent Brayden Savage initially backed Murnan  he said  she told him last month that if he didn t resign  the district would terminate him because of the cost of increased security  The district asked him to sign an agreement that included a clause preventing him from talking publicly about the controversy  Murnan said  but he refused  Savage didn t respond to a request for comment  Murnan is the latest example of an educator singled out by Walters over ideological disagreement  Walters accused a teacher in 2022 of promoting pornography by sharing a QR code to access book from the Brooklyn Public Library  the teacher quit and moved out of the state a Walters moved to revoke her teaching license  Last August  Walters promoted a Libs of TikTok post about an Oklahoma school librarian   who said her  radical liberal agenda is teaching kid to love book and be kind    and suggested it showed a  woke ideology   the librarian s district for several day received bomb threat  which were deemed not credible Ryan Walters  Oklahoma s school superintendent  warned that people who hired Shane Murnan will be  held accountable  Christopher Creese for NBC NewsReacting to earlier report about Murnan s exit  Walters posted a video on Feb  2 calling his resignation  a big win for Oklahoma school   He promised that people who hired him  will be held accountable   The Oklahoma Education Department declined to answer several question regarding Walters  statement about Murnan and Western Heights  but Walters said in a statement he ha  proposed the most aggressive model in the nation for identifying and uprooting these folk from our school  Walters recently proposed a regulation that would allow educator to be fired for  act that excessively promote sexuality  outside of work  in the presence of a minor or in a manner available to a minor online   He ha said the proposed rule  which is still being considered by the state agency  is an attempt to prevent others who perform in drag from holding position a teacher or administrator  and the department ha stated it assumes such educator are  likely to behave inappropriately in the presence of minor in a classroom  The anonymous newsletter that first called attention to Murnan  called V1SUT  ha also frequently focused on decade old criminal charge against Murnan that were dropped Murnan wa charged with possession of child sexual abuse material in 2001  when he wa a fifth grade teacher  Two judge dismissed the charge  ruling that prosecutor couldn t prove the allegation  and the case were expunged  Murnan contends a former colleague fabricated the allegation Before Western Heights hired him a a principal  Murnan passed a background check  and the district said it wa aware of his past court case  The district ha said he came highly recommended  and it noted his teaching certificate had recently been reissued to him  signed by Walters  Community member rallied in September to defend Murnan  They showed up at the school board meeting with shirt reading   StandWithMurnan   Murnan said he didn t hide his side gig a a drag queen  but he also didn t boast about it at school  There s never been an issue  because I ve never put it out there to make it an issue   he said   I did my side job on the weekend  and then I went to work and worked my tail off to make the school a better place  They never conflicted with each other  Then someone took it and ran with it and tried to make it into a spectacle that it s not  Savage  the district superintendent  told John Glenn Elementary School staff member at a Dec  15 meeting that she had defended Murnan  according to video of the meeting obtained by NBC News  However  Savage told the employee that Murnan wouldn t return to the elementary school campus because she and the district were still receiving hate mail and threat  I m not caving to Ryan Walters   Savage told the staff   but I have to ultimately keep the student and the staff of this school safe  The hate ha not stopped  To bring Shane back to the building is a risk to safety for all  I cannot be totally sure that one of those crazy will not show up to  quote unquote  cleanse the building  which is something I ve seen over and over again  In January  Murnan said  the district unexpectedly put him on administrative leave  Savage then asked him to resign  citing the expense of extra security  Murnan said  Savage told The Oklahoman the district had spent about  65 000 since August on additional security  administrative help  and other cost  Murnan said he signed a resignation letter on Jan  26  Murnan said his ouster raise question about the state education department s focus  Right now  it s not about the kid in

title: Iowans flock Capitol heated hearing Kim Reynolds  bill defining  man   woman
summary: House File 2389 ha drawn widespread condemnation from LGBTQ  right advocacy group  who branded it a  erasure  of transgender and nonbinary people
source_text: flock to Capitol for heated hearing on Kim Reynolds  bill defining  man  and  woman Stephen Gruber Miller Galen BacharierDes Moines RegisterTransgender Iowans accused lawmaker of trying to  erase  them  while others urged legislator to stand for  biological truth  at a heated hearing at the Iowa Capitol on a bill that would define  man  and  woman  in state law Two dozen Iowans spoke Monday night at an hourlong public hearing on the bill  House File 2389  while outside in the Capitol rotunda  hundred of protester with LGBTQ  and transgender right flag shouted and cheered throughout the hearing Gov  Kim Reynolds introduced the controversial bill earlier this month  The legislation would add new definition of man and woman to state law  a well a require change to birth certificate and government collection of data The bill ha drawn widespread condemnation from LGBTQ  right advocacy group  who branded it a  erasure  of transgender and nonbinary people and a violation of privacy Republicans fast tracked Reynolds  proposal last week  advancing it through subcommittee and committee hearing over the course of an afternoon over the objection of Democrats and advocate More Iowa Gov  Kim Reynolds  bill defining a  man  and a  woman   explained in 75 secondsHeated testimony at hearing come amid raucous chant outsideReynolds ha described the legislation a a  woman s bill of right   while opponent say it would not only harm LGBTQ Iowans but could impact other service  like aid for sexual assault and domestic abuse victim Denise Bubeck  deputy director of The Family Leader s Church Ambassador Network  said she wa thankful that Reynolds brought the bill forward  It is legislation based on biological truth   she said   Actually  none of u would be here today if it wasn t for biology  God created woman and man  Period  Max Mowitz described themselves a a proud Iowan  The legislation will likely cause many LGBTQ Iowans to leave the state  Mowitz said   but I cannot bring myself to do the same   Being an Iowan is just a important to me a being trans   Mowitz said   This is my state  too  Every time I come to this Capitol  I am reminded of how much I love a state that doe not love me back  The atmosphere in the room grew tense at time  with one speaker describing transgender woman in woman s bathroom a engaging in  domestic terrorism  and another likening being transgender to joining a cult Rep  Skyler Wheeler  R Hull  who ran the hearing  stopped the speaker several time throughout the night a chant of  you will not erase u  echoed through the frosted glass door of the committee room  We re going to hold off until that stop   he said at one point   I know when you re in here you can probably hear fine  but a I said earlier we re not going to have a heckler s veto  Acting on signal from those standing just outside the committee room s door  the crowd began chanting while proponent of the legislation spoke inside When the crowd got word that Wheeler wa pausing  they initially quieted down before breaking into another chant in response   we won t play your game  that s not why we came  During the hearing  others gathered in the hallway strained to hear testimony  holding their phone to their ear with a live stream pulled up  When it came to a close  chant were amplified a the room emptied and some of those who were in the room joined the rotunda crowd  We ll keep showing up   they chanted before dispersing  also shouting expletive directed at Reynolds Berry Stevens  a genderfluid 13 year old  said the law attempt to write them out of existence and would endanger LGBTQ Iowans  Because you seem to need a reminder  gender is how we present ourselves to the world and sex is based on anatomical genetic and chromosomal detail   Stevens said   You can know my gender based on how I present and introduce myself  however you can t know my sex without accessing my medical record  genetic testing or you being a creep  Josh Briggs  a father of four girl  said it wa  ridiculous  that the legislation wa needed  But he said opponent of the bill  forced the need for this legislation through their totalitarian tactic   It doe not take a biologist to understand that male and female are different  not just in sexual organ  but size  shape  respiratory system  skin  hair  nervous system  brain  sensory immune system  tissue   he said   The science is truly clear  More What you should know about the Iowa bill that legally defines  man    woman  and  sex Reynolds  bill would define sex  female  male  woman  girl  man  boy  father and mother in state law  and require new birth certificate for transgender Iowans to include the sex assigned at birth and current identity  after the state registrar receives a notarized affidavit from a licensed physician or surgeon stating the reason for surgery and the person s changed sex designation During committee  Republicans amended the bill to remove language that would require transgender Iowans to get a new marking on their driver s license to identify their sex assigned at birth and current identity Several speaker took issue with a line in the bill that say   equal  doe not mean  same  or  identical    and that  separate accommodation are not inherently unequal   I am confused why we are here discussing the concept of separate but equal and how our governor belief this bill is constitutional we all know separate but equal is inherently unconstitutional   said Annie Sarcone  director of the Des Moines Queer Youth Resource Center Geralyn Jones  a mother from Linn County  said it s simple to define a woman s biological makeup  I find it insulting that we have legislator and school board member and others in position of authority that find it challenging to define what a female is   she said   That s unacceptable  You re supposed to be standing on truth  Galen Bacharier cover politics for the Register  Reach him at gbacharier registermedia com or  573  219 7440  and follow him on Twitter  galenbacharier Stephen Gruber Miller cover the Iowa Statehouse and politics for the Register  He can be reached by email at sgrubermil registermedia Her  AR 15 By streiff   2 07 PM on February 12  2024 The opinion expressed by contributor are their own and do not necessarily represent the view of RedState com  Unsplash  Scott Roberson Update   4 45 pm Eastern  During a Monday afternoon press conference  Christopher Hassig  commander of the HPD homicide unit  addressed the confusion regarding the shooter s identity  specifically gender  Per Hassig  Advertisement  Our shooter is identified by a driver s license a Genesse Moreno  36 year old  Hispanic female  There are some discrepancy   we do have report she used multiple alias  including  Jeffrey Escalante   so she ha utilized both male and female name  But through all of our investigation to this point  talking with individual  interview  document  Houston Police Department report she ha been identified this entire time a female   she her  And so we are identifying her a Genesse Moreno  Hispanic female  The child ha been identified a Moreno s seven year old biological son  He sustained one gunshot wound to the head and is in critical condition Additionally  authority provided some clarification regarding the reported writing sticker on the weapon  Authorities stated that the buttstock of the AR 15 she wielded featured a sticker of the word  Palestine   Previous report incorrectly stated the long gun featured the word  Free Palestine   Hassig stated  antisemitic writing  have been discovered in subsequent investigation into Genesse Authorities also provided some additional background that may point to a potential motive Hassig also stated the shooter had a history of mental health illness and wa previously put under emergency detention order by Houston police  Genesse appears to have legally purchased at least one of the gun used in the attack a recently a December  The commander stated the shooter may have been embroiled in a familial dispute with the family of an ex husband  We do believe there wa a familial dispute between her and her ex husband s family  and some of those people are Jewish   Hassig said  Advertisement Original StorySunday  36 year old Genesse Ivonne Moreno  accompanied by a five year old child  walked into Joel Osteen s Lakewood Church in Houston and opened fire with an AR 15 style modern sporting rifle  wounding a 57 year old man before being killed by security guard  The child wa wounded and is hospitalized ALERT  Houston Police Confirm Shooter Dead  2 Injured After Gunfire at Osteen Church During ServiceA larger tragedy wa avoided by Lakewood Church having armed security guard who were doing their job diligently and a plan for the possibility of an active shooter As the fact dripped out  it became evident that this shooting would be quickly memory holed  The shooter wa a  transwoman  whose real name wa Jeffrey Escalante  Escalante wa from El Salvador  but there is no word on his immigration status  Per law enforcement record  Moreno also had identified a Jeffery Escalante in the past  and had prior arrest for assault  forgery  marijuana possession  theft  evading  and unlawful carrying weapon  Jeremy Rogalski   JRogalskiKHOU  February 12  2024The AR 15 he carried had  Free As I ve noted before  the trans movement ha a very dark and violent undertone In the past four year  there ha been a surge in the number of mass shooting carried out by transgender or related murderer transgender female to male Aberdeen  MD  workplace shooting  Last Week There Was a Mass Shooting at a Maryland Industrial Park but No One Seems to Care   September 2018  Snochia Moseley  transgender and woman   is very small  they are disproportionately represented  Second  they are of the female to male variety  Third  the shooting run in tandem with the violent imagery and rhetoric used by transgenders and their supporter We need to wake up to what is going on  People already suffering from a mental disorder and who may be on a hormonal drug regimen are becoming radicalized and encouraged to use violence to address their grievance with the rest of the world  The political side of the transgender movement is not benign  that movement openly promotes violence  and until it is title: Greeks protest sex marriage adoption reform
summary: The Orthodox Church of Greece   which ha close tie to many government MPs   ha said it is  totally opposed  to the reform
source_text: Greeks protest against same sex marriage and adoption reform The Orthodox Church of Greece   which ha close tie to many government MPs   ha said it is  totally opposed  to the reform  February 12  2024 07 58 am   Updated 02 03 pm IST   Caracus AFP COMMents SHARE Copy link Email Facebook Twitter Telegram LinkedIn WhatsApp Reddit READ LATER Remove SEE ALL Protesters take part in a rally against same sex marriage  at central Syntagma square  in Athens  Greece  Sunday  Feb  11  2024    Photo Credit  AP A protest against legalising same sex marriage and adoption in Greece drew several thousand people in Athens on Sunday ahead of a debate in parliament next week Some 4 000 people responded to a call by Orthodox religious group  according to police  They gathered on central Syntagma Square  waving Greek flag and brandishing cross anxd banner opposing same sex parenthood  Hands off the child   chanted the crowd  which featured several robed priest and supporter of the far right party Niki  whose leader Dimitris Natsios wa present The Orthodox Church of Greece   which ha close tie to many government MPs   ha said it is  totally opposed  to the reform  arguing that it  condemns  child to grow up in an  environment of confusion  Protester Efrosini  an Athens pensioner  said same sex couple already have right under a civil union reform adopted in 2015 Even Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis  who is personally championing the Bill  ha stressed that the change would benefit just  a few child and couple  The Bill is expected to split Mitsotakis  conservative New Democracy  with dozen of the party s 158 lawmaker likely to oppose it or abstain However  it is likely to pas with the support of the main opposition Syriza party  whose leader Stefanos Kasselakis is gay  the socialist Pasok party and other smaller party  COMMents SHARE Copy link Email Facebook Twitter Telegram LinkedIn WhatsApp Reddit Related Topics LGBT

Utah school board member face call to resign over post falsely suggesting teen girl wa transgender Transgender woman accused of sexually abusing infant escape jail time after copping plea deal A transgender woman day care worker who pleaded guilty to misdemeanor sexual misconduct after she wa accused of molesting a baby girl while changing the child s diaper will escape further jail time  according to report  Maria Childres  25  allegedly bragged to co worker at the Explore Learning Academy in Paducah  Ky   about two hour north of Nashville  that the child  liked  the November 2022 abuse  An anonymous tipster apparently told authority that they saw Childres  who wa born a biological male named Mark  rub the child s genitals in a  circular motion  and that the baby appeared to be in distress  according to court record obtained by the Reduxx news site  The colleague had asked Childres for help changing the infant s diaper and Childres allegedly told her fellow employee   that wa her clit area and she like it  It just made her day   The day care director had apparently been aware of Childres  behavior with the baby but had only given her a  write up   police discovered when they went to the facility  WPDS TV reported last year  Transgender woman Maria Childres escaped jail time and may avoid a criminal record in exchange for a plea deal despite sexually abusing a baby  McCracken County Jail When questioned by police  Childres at first denied she changed the baby s diaper but later admitted doing so after being shown text between herself and the day care boss  according to report  Reduxx obtained court record detailing the full complaint against Childers  revealing that she wa accused of both physical and sexual abuse while working at the day care center  Cops later discovered Childers had also been accused by other co worker of leaving the child in high chair for  hour  without care  Under questioning  Childres tried to deny having ever said anything inappropriate  but admitted she often said thing that were  taken out of context   Judge Joseph Roark sentenced Maria Childres to a 12 month penalty  but withheld jail time and given a conditional discharge for six month  If she abides by the condition  she may not face any jail time at all  Linkedin Joseph Roark Childers wa arrested and charged with one count of first degree sexual abuse of a activist lawyer Madison Leach to represent her  and the crime wa later reduced to a misdemeanor by Judge Joseph Roark  Childres wa incarcerated from February 8  2023 through January 26  2024  The crime wa later reduced to a misdemeanor by Judge Joseph Roark but Roark told The Post that prosecutor recommended the charge be reduced to a misdemeanor and he merely went along with their Abusing Infant Maria Childers  25   Photo via  McCracken County Jail   Kentucky  OAN s Brooke Mallory3 29 PM   Thursday  February 8  2024 A biological man that now identifies a a transgender woman who wa accused of sexually assaulting an infant entered into a plea agreement  and if he continues to comply with the term of the agreement  will not go to prison in Kentucky  Advertisement Former childcare worker  Maria Childers  enlisted the help of a well known trans activist attorney to defend him in the horrifying case  Following an anonymous complaint to the Department of Community Based Services  DCBS  regarding purported abuse at Explore Learning Academy that wa first reported in November 2022  Childers wa finally placed under arrest in February 2023 after a thorough investigation  According to the tip  which wa allegedly submitted by one of Childers  coworkers  he wa accused of inappropriately touching the baby s private part and making inappropriate comment while it wa being changed on a changing table  Now that the press ha been given access to the complete complaint against Childers this week  it show that he wa accused of both physical and sexual abuse during his tenure working at the daycare facility  On February 8th  2023  a DCBS case worker and a Paducah Police Department officer visited the daycare to speak with witness after receiving the first anonymous complaint  They were then able to verify the anonymous allegation by chatting with numerous employee who had also witnessed Childers  disturbing behavior  Witness testimony said that Childers wa asked to help a coworker change an infant s diaper  The coworker noted that the baby seemed distressed a Childers wa cleaning the baby s genitalia and inquired a to whether Childers wa injuring the child management despite being reported  Subsequently  the police discovered that Childers had also been accused by other colleague of neglecting the kid in high chair for  hour   Upon being brought to the police station for interrogation  Childers first claimed that he had not changed the baby s diaper whatsoever  Nevertheless  after an officer showed him a text message that he had sent to the director of the daycare verifying the baby s diaper change  he subsequently acknowledged having done so  Later  Childers attempted to refute any inappropriate remark that he had made and maintained that he frequently made statement that were  taken out of context   in his own word  Soon after  Childers wa taken into custody and charged with three count of first degree criminal abuse of a child under the age of twelve and one count of first degree sexual abuse of a victim under the age of twelve  The McCracken County Jail then received a booking for him  His last name ha been spelled differently by the court  the police  and his social medium account  which alternate between the spelling  Childers  and  Childres   This ha caused considerable confusion  His name is written  Childres  in the Kentucky Court of Justice record  while  Childers  appears under his own signature and in his defense file  Although Childers wa first identified a  male  by the police and the jail  internal record that the outlet Reduxx wa able to obtain show that the McCracken County Jail eventually changed Childers  reported sex to  female   Court document also revealed that Childers hired trans activist attorney Madison Leach on a private basis to represent him barely one month after he wa detained  When Leach campaigned a a Democrat for the Calloway County attorney seat  he became the first openly transgender candidate to run for public office in western Kentucky  Leach is a biological man who started identifying a a transgender woman seven year ago  Leach filed a request to lower Childers  bond  claiming that when he wa held in solitary confinement at the McCracken County Jail  he wa  deprived of estrogen   The request wa eventually granted  and Childers  bond wa lowered from  100 000 to  5 000  The bail requirement included staying away from the daycare where he had worked and having no contact with minor  In January 2024  Childers wa freed from detention  Childers seems to have reached an agreement with prosecutor on January 29th  2024  His charge of First Degree Sexual Abuse of a Victim Under 12 wa modified to Class A Misdemeanor Sexual Misconduct in return for a guilty plea  and the other abuse count were shockingly withdrawn  Judge Joseph Roark handed Childers  a 12 month penalty   but deferred sentencing and granted a six month conditional release  Childers may even avoid having a criminal record and avoid doing any prison time a long a he follows the rule established by the court throughout the six month term  Kentucky transgender daycare worker  Maria source_text: University of California campus see dramatic rise in student identifying a transgender or non binary Gender non conforming  non binary and transgender student have tripled over the last four year By Nikolas Lanum Fox News Published February 11  2024 6 00am EST Facebook Twitter Flipboard Comments Print Email close Video Study find university liberalize student Former professor Peter Boghossian call university  indoctrination mill   The University of California system is seeing a staggering increase in the number of student who identify a either transgender or non binary  According to data released in January  the number of undergraduate student identifying a non binary across UC system campus rose by over 2 000 from 2019 to 2023 The San Francisco Chronicle noted that last year  the UC changed it data collection process and consolidated the term  non binary    genderqueer  and  gender non conforming  into a singular  non binary category    Even taking into account that shift  the number and percentage of student identifying a trans or non binary increased significantly   the paper noted  The percentage of student identifying a gender non conforming  non binary or transgender ha also tripled over the last four year   06  in 2019 to 1 9  in 2023   Most of the student fell under the non binary category  while transgender men and woman were identified a the smallest demographic in 2023  at  2  and  1   respectively  POLL FINDS AMERICANS DON T THINK BIOLOGICAL MEN SHOULD COMPETE IN WOMEN S SPORTS   PENDULUM HAS SWUNG TOO FAR  A pedestrian walk by a sign in front of the U C  Berkeley campus on July 22  2020  in Berkeley  California    Photo by Justin Sullivan Getty Images  UC Berkeley reported a major uptick in the number of student identified a transgender or gender non conforming  rising from  2  in 2019 up to 1 8  in 2023  The university s Director of LGBTQ Advancement and Equity  Em Huang  said a systemwide rule allowing student to use a name of their choice and gender identity on nearly all official document may have made the school more appealing to transgender and non binary student The university is also in the process of converting many gendered bathroom stall into gender neutral bathroom  UC Santa Cruz had the largest non binary and transgender undergraduate population in 2023  4  and 1 1     The data on UC school come after the result of the 2022 U S  Transgender Survey Early Insights report  the largest survey of transgender people in the United States  wa released  FOX NEWS POLL  VOTERS WANT SCHOOLS TO TEACH title: Everybody loses Parkrun row   sport transgender debate go away
summary: Comment  Nothing is at stake at Parkrun but it move to remove various record from it site  Ben Bloom writes  could eventually impact funding distributed by Sport England and health benefit to many community around the world

browser to be logged inSportEverybody loses in Parkrun row   sport s transgender debate will not go awayComment  Nothing is at stake at Parkrun but it move to remove various record from it site  Ben Bloom writes  could eventually impact funding distributed by Sport England and health benefit to many community around the worldBen BloomSaturday 10 February 2024 08 02Article bookmarkedFind your bookmark in your Independent Premium section  under my profileDon t show me this message again  CloseRelated video  Christmas Day Parkrun take place at Stormont Sign up to our free sport newsletter for all the latest news on everything from cycling to boxingSign up to our free sport email for all the latest newsPlease enter a valid email addressPlease enter a valid email addressSIGN UPI would like to be emailed about offer  event and update from The Independent  Read our privacy noticeAs ridiculous a it sound  and it is  without doubt  an absurd thing to have done   my wife cried when she watched her first Parkrun a few year ago Not at the fast finishing time  although there were a few  not at the mini internal battle silently encouraging runner to eke out that tiny extra burst of effort approaching the finish line  not at the level of competition  which wa so low that it wa almost absent  Simply because she wa overwhelmed by the inclusive nature of a community event that truly embraced everyone A shared activity that welcomed  encouraged and in no way judged  Running for all  old and young  fast and slow  able and barely able but happily willing People running the 5km Parkrun held every Saturday morning in the UK and around the world  Getty Images A couple of week later  she began taking part  sometimes trying to beat her previous best time and on other occasion steadily plodding along while reaping the benefit of the endorphin flooding her mind and body on a collective Saturday morning run  jog or walk  delete a applicable   The tear have ceased but the original sentiment remains  this free  weekly five kilometre event that nine million people have signed up for globally is an overwhelmingly positive thing  right Well  it depends on who you ask  For the past few month  campaigner have been protesting in person and on social medium against Parkrun  threatening to call for taxpayer  money   in the form of funding distributed by Sport England   to be withdrawn  Their issue is the organisation s policy of collecting participant data based on gender identity rather than biological sex  Yes  it s the thorny subject of transgender right and sport Runners taking part in the Bushy Park Parkrun  PA When someone register with Parkrun they are asked their gender and provided four option to choose from  female  male  another gender identity and prefer not to say According to campaigner   including the right leaning think tank Policy Exchange   such a policy allows transgender runner to identify a female  which threatens the sanctity of woman s sport Last December  Policy Exchange released a document supported by a smattering of high profile sportspeople  which found that there have been  at least three verified instance of transgender woman  biological male  competing in the female category and setting new woman s record and distorting female ranking  As an increasingly transphobic culture ha steadily seeped into all aspect of society  so have the protest against Parkrun deepened until  this Thursday  the organisation acted  Amid call to introduce a separate transgender record section in it result  Parkrun instead pulled various metric from it website  including gender  course and age record Some runner complete Parkrun each week while pushing a buggy or alongside their dog  Getty Images Eager to portray itself a a health charity and community event rather than a formal sport or competition  Parkrun suggested the decision wa not a direct response to the transgender issue and wa instead aimed at removing any  disconnect between the performance data displayed so prominently on the site  and our mission to create opportunity for a many people a possible   But do not be mistaken   the record would still be there if these campaign were not ongoing At this point  there is a vital distinction to make  one that could not be of greater importance  Parkrun is not elite sport  Many people enjoy using record a motivation to compete against themselves and others  with their existence solely designed to add interest and widen participation But they do not define Parkrun   an organisation that ha celebrated a steady slowing in average finishing time of participant with each passing year a more people take part In elite or professional sport  a small number of male to female transgender athlete  who posse physical benefit gained from experiencing puberty a a man  have the very real potential to deny cisgender woman their livelihood  take medal and money away from those who were born female  and pose a genuine threat to the entire purpose of woman s sport Runners gather at the start line at Heaton Park  Manchester  Getty Images for The National Lo Those same transgender people taking part in Parkrun hold precisely none of those threat  Nothing is at stake  No money is available to be won  There is no podium  no medal  In the grand scheme of thing  the record that have now been removed were entirely meaningless beyond providing some element of interest to those who might seek them out In the same way that they did not show whether someone ha surgically or otherwise changed their gender  they also did not reveal whether a runner wa aided by an eager dog pulling on a lead or hamstrung by having to navigate pothole and hill while pushing a wailing toddler in an unwieldy buggy Typically  the decision to remove the record ha done nothing to appease Parkrun s naysayer  Sharron Davies  the former Olympic swimmer turned campaigner  described the move a  cowardly  for not forcing transgender runner to be separated into their own category  To her  those who have changed gender must be stripped of a brilliant community event s multiple health benefit unless they publicly reveal themselves to all So no one ha won  While Parkrun try it hardest to focus solely on inclusion and positively impacting the life of a broad a range of people a possible   including hundred of thousand who would otherwise never engage with traditional sport or exercise   the call for it to be stripped of funding will carry on Maybe they will be successful and one of the most accepting  free  physical activity phenomenon of recent decade will find itself incapable of continuing  By it own admission  no one win at Parkrun  But everyone could stand to lose  Would that really be worth it More Parkrun event director quits over  inclusive policy  a CEO pleads to  turn heat down  on trans row All record were erased earlier this week  apparently after controversy that some woman s best were held by transgender runner Jeremy Wilson  Chief Sports Reporter 9 February 2024   7 10pm Related Topics Running  UK Athletics Parkrun is a mass participation running event held in public park every Saturday morning Credit  ALAMY Alan Harbottle Parkrun is facing a backlash over it decision to scrap all time record after a row over transgender athlete taking female record One event director resigned in response to the sudden removal of record a the organisation s chief executive pleaded for le  heat  over the trans debate All time gender record disappeared from the website of every Parkrun and Junior Parkrun around the world on Thursday Russ Jefferys  the chief executive of Parkrun  is adamant that the decision   which also includes scrapping best time across age and course bracket   wa not influenced by an ongoing campaign to make participant declare their sex at birth after it wa reported that at least three female record were set by transgender woman Weekly result of the 5km race  which is run by thousand of people every Saturday morning  will still be published  with Parkrun saying that it primary function is working a a public health charity rather than facilitating competition But the move fuelled accusation of  sex discrimination  from critic including former Olympic swimmer Sharron Davies  who said it had taken a  cowardly  position The Women s Rights Network said that Parkrun  would rather stop publishing age category data and ranking rather than allow fair sport for woman and girl   adding   there s only been uproar now because they d rather wipe record than be fair to woman  Mr Jefferys said   I think we need to be careful about making serious accusation   sadly there is just a lot of anger and emotion in this conversation  I think we would all benefit from just turning the heat down and remembering that  in the end  Parkrun is a free  fun community event and a great way to start the weekend   Not a competitive athletic event Speaking on BBC 5Live  Mr Jefferys wa challenged over Parkrun s suggestion that displaying record on the website had become off putting to new entrant and wa asked if they had received complaint  Not so much complaint but we conduct regular survey and we know that one of the biggest barrier   to participation is the misperception that Parkrun is a race   he said  I think the criticism we faced from the Women s Rights Network and others is down to a total misunderstanding of what Parkrun is  It is not a race  It is not a competitive athletic event  He added that since the event s inception a a time trial in 2004  it ha  clearly evolved  into a  health charity  The chief executive s comment came after a Parkrun official quit his role over the move Mick Anglim announced his departure a Brockenhurst s Parkrun event director on Thursday night  writing on Facebook that he had resigned  in response to HQ s new  inclusive  policy  He later told Telegraph Sport that  everyone that I ve spoken to agrees that the removal of age category and age grade record is a mistake   Mr Anglim  who won the world duathlon title for over 75s in 2022  said that he would not completely abandon the Brockenhurst event  which ha attracted almost 14 000 people aged between four and 90  but that the change had reduced  motivation and challenge for all age group   If the record offend you  don t look at them The Facebook page  Parkrun Statsgeek Group   which ha more than 13 000 member  launched an online poll to gauge opinion about the change  Of more than 2 200 response  82 per cent indicated their disagreement with the new policy Members aired their dismay in comment  The most disappointing news I ve heard in a very long time   wrote Christian Dyer   Why would parkrun wish to take away feature adored by the vast majority to please a tiny   if that   minority   It s simply absurd and very sad  Nat Konners said that she had an  80 year old friend who is motivated by going out to see if they can get the age record at different parkruns  and that they would probably now lose motivation   How s that fair  Seriously if the record etc personally offend you  don t look   she said Paul Curtayne questioned whether people would really be put off   a ha been suggested by Parkrun   by the now removed tab of record and  drill down stats  that wa previously on their website   It s obviously nonsense   he said   I know many runner who run 40 50 minute and are not remotely worried that there are faster people  It s pretty patronising to suggest that  World Athletics  along with domestic running governing body  ha moved to ban transgender woman from female competition over the past year Campaigners are calling for a  sex at birth  category in Parkrun but organiser have refused  saying that it wa a community event rather than a race  This leaf runner free to continue self selecting their gender  amid concern that transgender people  whose transition might be entirely private  would stop attending if a  sex at birth  category wa mandated Runners wearing  Save Women s Sport  T Shirts are planning to continue their protest this weekend Heather Binning  the founder of the Women s Rights Network  replied   Whilst Mr Jefferys belief that the fact Parkrun is not a race  debatable   nor a sport  debatable   he himself is missing the point that self id is not law in this country   Parkrun receives million pound of public fund to increase participation of woman and therefore the fact that their policy permit men to self identify in this category is wrong on many title: Sharron Davies question Parkrun decision delete record trans row
summary: Sharron Davies ha questioned the timing of Parkrun s decision to wipe all speed record from it website and suggested the organisation ha done so due to a debate about transgender runner
source_text: Sharron Davies question Parkrun s decision to delete record after trans row The former Olympic athlete had spent five year calling for Parkrun to change it approach to categorising runner   but is unhappy at time being completely wiped from the website  By Rachel McGrath  reporter  and Matthew Thompson  correspondent Saturday 10 February 2024 23 14  UK Please use Chrome browser for a more accessible video player 0 57 Davies is unhappy that Parkrun record have been completely removed  Pic  Sky Why you can trust Sky News Sharron Davies ha questioned the timing of Parkrun s decision to wipe all speed record from it website and suggested the organisation ha done so due to a debate about transgender runner Parkrun removed all speed record earlier this week and announced it will no longer be publishing data including first place finish  gender  course and age record  The organisation say it is because it run are not competitive  The move came amid criticism over transgender woman being allowed to compete in the female category  In December  at least three Parkrun female record were held by transgender woman  according to the thinktank Policy Exchange Speaking to Sky News  former Team GB Olympic swimmer Davies  who campaign against trans woman competing in female sporting category  cast doubt on Parkrun s claim that the deletion wa not sparked by the debate She said   I m sorry  I don t believe that this is something that they ve had planned for month or year  I believe this is a reaction to the criticism that they ve had recently about the competitiveness and the course record s   Parkrun said it had  made many change  to it website over the year  and will continue to do so a we evolve   in a statement published on Thursday It also said a  global working group  had  spent many month making detailed investigation and recommendation  to ensure data on it website wa  not off putting and doesn t imply that Parkrun is a race  Davies had spent five year campaigning for Parkrun to change it approach to record   but she is unhappy they have been removed completely The Olympian had instead suggested that  extra category  could be added for trans athlete She said   Personally  I would have preferred keeping the competitive result  But now this ha happened  The men are all complaining  that the record are gone  but for five year men haven t been title: SA Likely Endorse Trans Inquiry
summary: Of all place  South Australia is likely to be the first to hold a parliamentary inquiry into transgenderism
source_text: SA Likely to Endorse Trans Inquiry The groomers are too much even for the crow eater by Lushington D  Brady 10 February  2024 11 30 am9 February  2024 2 37 pm Share this Click to share on Twitter  Opens in new window Click to share on Facebook  Opens in new window Click to share on Telegram  Opens in new window Click to share on WhatsApp  Opens in new window Click to share on LinkedIn  Opens in new window Click to email a link to a friend  Opens in new window Click to print  Opens in new window  Photo by Sharon McCutcheon Opinion I have to say  I did not expect South Australia to be the first state to likely implement a parliamentary inquiry into the  transgender  madness  SA wa  until Victoria stole it crown just like it stole the Grand Prix  the proud bearer of the  Australia s Wokest State  mantle  But  decade after it premier famously posed for photo with bearded homo dressed a nun  even the pillow biting crow eater are arking up at the dangerous idiocy of transgenderism  Australia s first ever parliamentary inquiry into gender dy phoria will be put to a vote in South Australia on Wednesday  with several conservative Labor MPs prepared to back the plan amid a surge in transitioning case in South Australia  Not that trannyism is a fad or anything  The inquiry will examine all facet of treatment and support for young people with gender dysphoria  the model by which their condition is assessed  and the process by which puberty blocker and hormone can be administered  and operation approved  It will also consider the right of parent and guardian in the assessment and treatment of young people and the role of government in providing education and health service for gender dysphoria  Will it also consider the role of creepy gender whisperer  including those linked to Queer Theory think tank run by oleaginous shirt lifter who spent the 70 and 80 advocating for paedophile right  Just asking  The inquiry ha won national support from those urging a pause in the management of gender dysphoria  including a Sydney woman suing her psychiatrist for negligence after undergoing a mastectomy and hysterectomy after just one consultation when she wa 19  The backlash against transgenderism is reaching a point that even politician are sniffing the wind  While Labor s Left faction is opposed to the inquiry  The Australian can reveal that several conservative Labor MPs want a conscience vote on the issue so they can support the bill  Independent MP Frank Pangallo ha spent the past year preparing the case for the inquiry and is being supported by the Liberal opposition in SA and by One Nation  The Australian understands Premier Peter Malinauskas   who is from Labor s Right faction   ha been canvassed privately by Mr Pangallo but ha not indicated his position  Remember Homer Simpson s advice  Never say anything  unless you re sure everyone feel exactly the same way you do  Mr Pangallo s push for the inquiry show that despite Labor government largely defending the status quo  or ducking call to examine the issue  there are clearly many MPs in Labor rank who share his disquiet over the case number and the model being used to treat young people  In his speech to parliament  Mr Pangallo relied upon FOI  material obtained by NSW Labor MLC Greg Donnelly revealing the number of child and adolescent being treated for gender dysphoria by SA s Women s and Children s Health Network  In 2020  the total number stood at 58  with 21 female and 17 male receiving puberty blocker and 13 female and seven male undergoing stage two gender  affirming hormone treatment  Just one year later  the total number jumped to 149  with 91  female and 58 male receiving different form of treatment  They included 35 female and 33 male receiving puberty blocker and 26 female and 13 male  undergoing stage two gender  affirming hormone treatment  Tell u again that this isn t a fad  But  unlike fidget spinner or hula hoop  it s a fad that s leaving child stunted  crippled  and sterilised

securing rental  and interacting with law enforcement   Presenting inaccurate identification all too often becomes a trigger for various form of abuse and discrimination   a 2012 report by the Center going to be a defense game   and a movement strengthening game   said Andy Marra  executive director of the Transgender Legal Defense and Education Fund   We have witnessed a sophisticated  well coordinated and highly resourced effort to dismantle the year of progress that our movement ha made  The essence of the attack  Scores of bill enacted in Republican governed state over the past few year targeting transgender people  Many of law ban gender affirming medical care for trans minor or bar trans athlete from competing on girl  and woman s scholastic sport team  With a new wave of anti trans measure already introduced this year  the TLDEF and the National Center for Transgender Equality announced in January that they plan to merge this summer  The new organization will be called Advocates for Trans Equality  Marra will be it CEO  while it executive director will be Rodrigo Heng Lehtinen  who now hold that title with the NCTE  READ MORE Kansas  AG is telling school they must out trans kid to parent  even with no specific law Utah governor say school board member who questioned a student s gender  embarrassed the state  A West Virginia  Women s Bill of Rights  is an effort to suppress transgender people  critic say Marra said a key moment in deciding to consider the merger came in 2022  Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton and Gov  Greg Abbott  both Republicans  directed state child protection worker to investigate family of trans child for what Abbott termed  abusive gender transitioning service    I knew we needed a stronger  bolder response to the unprecedented vitriol and legislative attack on trans people nationwide   Marra said Unlike some merger  this one is not aimed at cost cutting or consolidation  according to Heng Lehtinen  He said current staff from each organization will be retained  and the new organization   after adding a few new hire   will likely have a staff of about 50 by the end of the year  working out of office in New York and Washington a well a remotely   When you hear  merger   you think there s some kind of crisis or duplication   he said   Not in this case   we simply think we ll be stronger  For Marra and Heng Lehtinen   and their ally in other LGBTQ  right organization   it s crucial to keep litigating  state by state  against the anti trans law  While some of the measure have taken effect  others have been blocked by federal judge  including some appointed by Republican president  Protesters of Kentucky Senate Bill SB150  known a the Transgender Health Bill  cheer on speaker during a rally on the lawn of the Kentucky Capitol in Frankfort  Ky   March 29  2023   AP Photo Timothy D  Easley  File  Another priority  in this election year  is to engage in political campaign  We need pro trans elected official winning their race and defeating candidate who are attacking trans people only to score political point   said Heng Lehtinen  He depicted the anti trans vitriol a a backlash to the broader gain made by the LGBTQ  right movement in recent decade   Anti LGBT group are shaking in their boot   he said   We ve made a lot of progress  and that s why they re fighting so hard  He s been immersed in politics since childhood   his mother  Ileana Ros Lehtinen  served 30 year in Congress  starting when he wa 3 year old At odds with most of her fellow Republicans in Congress  Ros Lehtinen became a staunch supporter of LGBTQ  right   for example  becoming the first GOP House member to support the legalization of same sex marriage  She wa vocally in support of Rodrigo s decision to come out a a transgender man  What make our family so very proud of Rodrigo is that he s so happy living an authentic life  being honest about who he is and bringing a lot of joy in our life   Ros Lehtinen said in a 2016 video urging parent to accept their trans child The national political environment   in regard to LGBTQ  right   ha changed dramatically since then  Back in 2016  after North Carolina enacted a  bathroom bill  restricting trans people s use of public restroom  there wa a major backlash  including cancellation of potentially lucrative business project and sporting event Over the past couple of year  the corporate world ha generally avoided similar threat a new anti trans measure took effect in North Carolina and elsewhere  Sales of Bud Light plunged because of conservative backlash to an ad campaign featuring transgender influencer Dylan Mulvaney Marra suggested that many corporation had become more wary of venturing into potentially divisive political issue  at a time when special interest group are scrutinizing how they deal with issue such a affirmative action and workforce diversity  We would like them to stay true to their value   Marra said  Demonstrators advocating for transgender right and healthcare stand outside of the Ohio Statehouse on Wednesday  Jan  24  2024  in Columbus  Ohio   AP Photo Patrick Orsagos  File  The cumulative impact of the anti trans law ha been tangible  according to survey finding that many trans people have considered moving to another city or state that would be more accepting  Several new organization have emerged in the past few year offering emergency funding to individual and family affected by anti trans legislation  either to relocate or to obtain medical care or service outside their home state Marra  who ha been active in the LGBTQ  right movement for 20 year  say she remains optimistic in the face of current setback  We are in many way in the fight of our life right now  but ultimately we are on the right side of history   she said  This year  we have an opportunity to bring the next generation of voter along in the next chapter of the fight for equality in this country   she added   We need to be engaging everyday folk across the country  sharing our story   DAVID CRARY Crary ha headed AP s 11 person religion team since 2020  Among previous AP job  he wa a foreign correspondent for 14 year interview with BBC Radio Somerset  the PM wa once again confronted with call from Brianna s father  Peter Spooner  to apologise Rishi Sunak ha refused to apologise for the jibe  made while Esther Ghey  Brianna s mother  visited Parliament  PA Mr Spooner ha said he wa disgusted with Mr Sunak and branded his comment  degrading  and  absolutely dehumanising  In a tense exchange  presenter Charlie title: Rishi Sunak refuse apologise transgender jibe front Brianna Ghey mother Commons
summary: The prime minister reject suggestion he made a joke and say it is  wrong  to  drag someone s family in the face of a tragedy into politics
source_text: Rishi Sunak refuse again to apologise for PMQs transgender jibe while Brianna Ghey s mother wa in parliament The prime minister reject suggestion he made a joke and say it is  wrong  to  drag someone s family in the face of a tragedy into politics   Friday 9 February 2024 15 47  UK Please use Chrome browser for a more accessible video player 0 55 Sunak refuse to apologise for jibe Why you can trust Sky News Rishi Sunak ha again refused to apologise for comment he made about transgender people in parliament this week  despite call from Brianna Ghey s father to do so Mr Sunak rejected suggestion he made a joke during Prime Minister s Questions when Brianna s mother  Esther Ghey  wa in parliament  That is not what I did  it is wrong to say that   he told BBC Radio Somerset on Friday  What happened wa a tragedy  and using that to try and detract from the completely separate and very clear point I wa making about Keir Starmer and his proven track record of U turning on multiple policy issue because he doesn t have a plan is  a I said  both sad and wrong and the worst of politics  Politics latest Rishi Sunak dismisses  clearly ridiculous  Vladimir Putin claimMr Sunak ha faced criticism for the comment he levelled at Sir Keir Starmer  in which he said the Labour leader had broken promise on  defining a woman  The exchange happened while Ms Ghey wa in parliament just a week after two teenager were sentenced for the murder of Brianna  who wa transgender In an interview with Sky News  Brianna s father Peter Spooner said Mr Sunak s remark during PMQs were  degrading  and  absolutely dehumanising  and urged him to apologise  As the prime minister for our country to come out with degrading comment like he did  regardless of them being in relation to discussion in parliament  they are absolutely dehumanising   he said  Identities of people should not be used in that manner  and I personally feel shocked by his comment and feel he should apologise for his remark   Please use Chrome browser for a more accessible video player 2 18 Brianna s father demand apology Mr Spooner wa also joined by former prime minister Gordon Brown in calling for Mr Sunak to apologise He told the Politics Hub With Sophy Ridge   Prime minister make mistake  I don t think you can say that every prime minister will fail to make some mistake  but I think you should apologise if you get thing wrong  And I mean it is a very sad and really tragic   a tragic case of a family in grief  I know he s said he s compassionate about the family  but perhaps he should do what I had to do on one or two occasion and apologise  And I do accept that if you make mistake  you ve got to correct them quickly   Please use Chrome browser for a more accessible video player 1 35 Gordon Brown say Rishi Sunak should apologise for jibe Mr Sunak ha so far resisted call to apologise and ha been defended by some Cabinet minister  including Business Secretary Kemi Badenoch  who said it wa  shameful of Starmer to link his own inability to be clear on the matter of sex and gender directly to her grief  Elsewhere in the BBC Radio Somerset interview  the prime minister turned his answer to Labour s decision to scrap it  28bn green spending pledge a  yet another U turn  Read more PM may yet be forced into apology for clumsy attack lineBrianna Ghey s father demand Sunak say sorry Be the first to get Breaking News Install the Sky News app for free But when BBC presenter Charlie Taylor interjected on whether he would apologise  Mr Sunak declined to do so  saying   To drag someone s family in the face of a tragedy into politics like this  I don t think is right  I think it s sad and it s wrong  However  policing minister Chris Philp told Sky News yesterday there wa a  wider point here for politician  for journalist  for everybody to keep in mind when there are very sensitive issue being discussed  to always use respectful and measured language  lest there are unintended consequence   Related Topics Brianna GheyRishi

title: Scottish Tory chair grilled Rishi Sunak trans jibe PMQs
summary: THE Scottish Toru chair ha responded to question over Rishi Sunak s transgender jibe made in the House of Commons at PMQs this week

Tory chair grilled over Rishi Sunak s trans jibe at PMQs BBC  Scottish Tory chair grilled over Rishi Sunak s trans jibe BBC Brianna Ghey PMQs Scottish Conservatives Media Politics Scotland By Adam Robertson  adam robertson9 Multimedia Journalist Share Craig Hoy wa grilled over Rishi Sunak s trans jibe at PMQs earlier this week  Image  PA  THE Scottish Tory chair ha responded to question over Rishi Sunak s transgender jibe made in the House of Commons at PMQs this week  Rishi Sunak wa met with heckle of  shame  and  disgusting  on Wednesday when he accused Keir Starmer of changing his position on  defining a woman  when the mother of murdered teenager Brianna Ghey wa visiting Westminster  We told on Thursday how he ha so far refused to apologise for the remark a the PM told Sky News it wa  legitimate  for him to make the point about Starmer  READ MORE  John Curtice give verdict on what new poll really mean for the SNP Asked by the BBC s Good Morning Scotland if Sunak should apologise  Scottish Tory chair Craig Hoy responded   I think that the murder of Brianna Ghey wa appalling and I would express my deepest sympathy to my family who were obviously there in the House of Commons this week   What happened to Brianna should be condemned across the political spectrum and I don t think anybody should seek to make political point out of it   Pressed further on whether Sunak should apologise  Hoy replied that the PM accounted for this by saying he wa not aware that Esther Ghey wa visiting at the time   I think the Prime Minister and myself would agree that Brianna s murder wa absolutely horrific but I wouldn t want this to become a political football   he added  It wa then put to Hoy that Brianna s father had called on the PM to apologise but that Sunak ha so far refused to do so  Asked if this wa a  dignified way to respond to a grieving parent   Hoy said   It s a matter obviously for the Prime Minister to set out what he wa aware of when he made that comment and what his view are in relation to that   He and I are absolutely of the view and I think everybody in British and Scottish politics is of the view that the murder of Brianna Ghey wa absolutely appalling and I just wouldn t want either the medium or other politician to try and turn this into a political football  It is an absolute tragedy   READ MORE  We may not need indyref2   Westminster is imploding by itself He continued   I m not sure if the Prime Minister wa aware at that time who wa in the gallery   I suppose one of these thing is about being authentic in politics  You have to apologise for thing that you ve done wrong and that you ve said inappropriately   I don t know what the Prime Minister knew at that particular point in time but I absolutely do know that every single politician  and this is why it s regrettable that this is becoming a political football  aided and abetted by the Labour Party and the medium  but I understand why you would ask those question but ultimately this wa an absolute tragedy and I think it would be regrettable if this became a party political issue at Westminster   BBC Brianna Ghey PMQs

general is telling public school they re required to tell parent their child are transgender or non binary even if they re not out at home  though Kansas is not among the state with a law that explicitly say to do that Republican Kris Kobach s action wa his latest move to restrict transgender right  following his successful effort last year to temporarily block Democratic Gov  Laura Kelly s administration from changing the listing for sex on transgender people s birth certificate and driver s license to reflect their gender identity  It s also part of a trend of GOP attorney general asserting their authority in culture war issue without a specific state law Kobach maintains that failing to disclose when a child is socially transitioning or identifying a non binary at school violates a parent  right  He sent letter in December to six school district and the state association for local school board member  then followed up with a public statement Thursday after four district  all in northeast Kansas  didn t rewrite their policy The Kansas attorney general s letter to superintendent of three Kansas City area district  Topeka s superintendent and the Kansas Association of School Boards accused them of having  surrendered to woke gender ideology   His letter didn t say what he would do if they didn t specifically require teacher and administrator to out transgender and non binary student LGBTQ  right advocate saw the letter a seeking policy that put transgender and non binary youth in physical danger but also a an attempt to tell transgender people that they re not welcome  Jordan Smith  leader of the Kansas chapter of the LGBTQ  right group Parasol Patrol  said forced outing will create more anxiety for student and even push some back into the closet  It s like they don t want u to exist in public place   said Smith  who is non binary  Five state have law requiring school to inform parent if their child use different pronoun  socially transition to a gender different than the one assigned at birth or present a non binary  according to the Movement Advancement Project  which support transgender right  Another six have law that encourage it  the project say Kansas is on neither list  A bill introduced last year would bar school from using the preferred pronoun for a student under 18 without a parent or guardian s written permission  but it did not clear a Senate committee  GOP lawmaker did enact a law over Kelly s veto that ended the state s legal recognition of transgender and non binary identity by defining male and female for legal purpose based on a person s  reproductive anatomy  identified at birth  But Republican state Sen  Renee Erickson of Wichita  a vocal supporter and a former middle school principal  said it doe not cover issue about whether school must inform parent about a child s gender identity at school Erickson said she now favor taking a look at the bill before a Senate committee  saying it address a  policy gap   The parent have a right to know what is affecting their child  They re an integral part  if not the most important part  in helping their child grow and develop with the value that the parent want   she said  But Kobach didn t cite Kansas law in his letter to the state school board association  the Topeka school district and the Kansas City  Shawnee Mission and Olathe school district in the Kansas City area  Instead  he cited U S  Supreme Court decision going back a far a 1923 that he said affirmed parent  right to control how their child are raised  His office released copy Thursday He told each of the four district that it policy on transgender student violated parent  right and said two other district in the Wichita area quickly rewrote their policy after his letter arrived  In his letter to the school board group  he noted it provides legal help to local district  It would be arrogant beyond belief to hide something with such weighty consequence from the very people  parent  that both law and nature vest with providing for a child s long term well being   Kobach wrote in each of the letter State attorney general serve a the lead lawyer for state government  and most also oversee at least some criminal prosecution  But they also look outward  and Kobach s letter weren t the first to issue warning not grounded in a specific state law Last year  Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton sent request to at least two medical provider that don t operate in his state for information about providing gender affirming care a part of an investigation  though it s not clear what Texas law would cover them  Washington state s attorney general invoked a law there to block Seattle Children s Hospital from complying  and QueerMed  a Georgia based telehealth provider  said on it website that it will not comply As for Kobach  Tom Alonzo  a Kansas City  Kansas  LGBTQ  right advocate  argued that the Kansas attorney general is bent on  intentional marginalization  of transgender people  There s no excuse for it   he said a he staffed a table Thursday in the Statehouse   I wa a gay kid hiding in high school  I remember how ugly high school can be if you re out   While the Kansas City  Kansas  district declined comment  the other three district said they deal with transgender and non binary student case by case and seek to work with parent  The Topeka district expressed confidence that it practice are legal  The four district are among the largest in Kansas and together have more than 88 000 student or 18  of the total for the state s public school  The strongest response came from Michelle Hubbard  the Shawnee Mission superintendent  in her district s response in December  She said  it is rarely the case  that student seek something  entirely opposed  by their parent She also chided Kobach for not citing actual case in the district of parent  right being violated and suggested that he wa relying on  misinformation  from  partisan source   She called his use of woke  a an insult  disappointing in an attorney general  We are not caricature from the polarized medium  but rather real people who work very hard in the face of intense pressure on public school   Hubbard wrote     Mulvihill reported from Cherry Hill  New Jersey More aboutKris KobachAPKansas CityLaura KellyKANLGBTQ title: 2 Vancouver group say rejected Lunar New Year parade
summary: Two Vancouver based organization say they were rejected from taking part in this year s Lunar New Year parade in Chinatown
source_text: Vancouver Vancouver Island Windsor Winnipeg Search CTVNews ca Search Vancouver 2 Vancouver group say they were rejected by Lunar New Year parade Share Update  Feb  9  Organizers reversed course Friday and decided to allow the two group to participate  Read more here  The original story follows  Two Vancouver based organization say they were rejected from taking part in this year s Lunar New Year parade in Chinatown  Chinatown Together and Vancouver Lunar New Year For All  told CTV News they were both invited to apply to participate by the Vancouver Chinatown Spring Festival Celebration Committee  After applying in January  both received email stating they had been denied  and needed to show documentation they were registered non profit  Melody Ma  a co founder with Chinatown Together said this requirement wa never communicated on the application form or included in the rule and regulation  Ma said she submitted the requested form  the group wa approved  and then day later  the decision wa rescinded   We were disappointed  we were disheartened and shocked   Ma said   Political activism  The rejection email from the Vancouver Chinatown Spring Festival Celebration Committee   a group made up of six organization including the Chinese Benevolent Association of Vancouver  said   While your passion for advocacy ha been recognized  it is essential to underscore that political activism find no place within the spirit of this event   Ma said there wa nothing political about the group wanting to be included in the event  She said member had spent hour sewing banner with the word   Chinatown Together   and  Embracing Rainbows    Many of u have a strong connection to the Chinatown parade   Ma said   It ha a significant place in our heart   Ma grew up dancing in the parade a one of Mimi Ho s Strathcona Chinese dancer   Finding out that  a an adult  I can t participate in the parade and we are banned from marching on baseless accusation  is really disappointing   she said  In an emailed statement to CTV News  The Vancouver Chinatown Spring Festival Celebration Committee said it s  committed to upholding the tradition of promoting community  collaboration and tolerance across culture    We are also committed to ensuring that the parade is a safe and inclusive event for all participant and spectator   the statement said  adding it will make the decision to accept or reject parade team application based on this criterion   It just feel really frustrating  Pearl Wong  an organizer with Vancouver Lunar New Year For All   which wa also denied   said the group wa created due to a lack of LGBTQ representation   We thought it would be nice to have that  a Queer and Trans people who are also of Asian heritage   Wong said   We wanted a group that wa by u and for u   Wong said the committee s non profit regulation wa never relayed to organizer or outlined in the application  Ultimately  Wong said due to timing they weren t able to apply for non profit status and had to bow out of being in the parade  They said they followed up with the committee for clarification into the decision  but no answer wa provided   Lunar New Year is a festival of coming together  of being together with family and community  and so for them to put these gate behind folk  it just feel really frustrating to see that happen   they said  The parade is set to take place Sunday and is one of the largest celebration in the community  drawing thousand of people  Ma and Wong said they still plan on attending  even a spectator  Ma added that since receiving the news about the rejection  dozen of people plan to show up in solidarity Sunday for the group to celebrate what the event is all about   community   Chinatown s sustainability and the sustainability of this culture really depends on it youth and young people to continue these tradition like the Chinatown parade   Ma said  Vancouver Top Stories B C  ha gained 708 family doctor title: Vancouver Lunar New Year parade revers decision bar progressive  LGBTQ  group
summary: VANCOUVER   Organizers of the Vancouver Chinatown Lunar New Year parade have changed course and rescinded their rejection of two progressive and LGBTQ  group that they previously barred from participating
